A furious Hamish Watson has branded the call to send off Scotland prop Zander Fagerson "rubbish" and "not rugby" following the defeat by Wales.

articles.title: Arsenal legend Tony Adams slams recruitment of Martin Odegaard, Willian and Nicolas Pepe - Daily Mail
articles.description: The trio have all been signed over the past two seasons, with Martin Odegaard joining on loan while Nicolas Pepe and Willian were brought in on permanent deals.
articles.content:
